description:
Take a musical trip down memory lane with this collection of past Monster Hunter base themes!

- "Awakening" BGM
- "Pokke Village Theme" BGM
- "The Village of Wind and Meadow - Bherna Village" BGM
- "Hunters of the Skies" BGM

'After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.
name: "Monster Hunter Series Bases" BGM
